title: LoL crashing on my Mac (Both clients tried)
body:
So i was playing normally today on my mac, it worked all fine. I had a break, came back to the game and after we all picked our champs, and it was about to go to loading screen... It literally was all black, i tried to do commando - option/alt + esc... And tried to reconnect, it`s still the same, It shows me the game crashed after pushing those magic buttons.... I even at last tried to delete LoL, and reinstall it all. Still same trouble.... I haven`t installed anything to my mac recently, so I have actually no clue whats up. 
Any suggestions ?

replies.body:
It sounds an awful like there's a *poor connection* to the servers going on. You should be able to resolve this by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac), which goes over the most common local network settings that conflict with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
I literally tried the whole guide, and It still not working m8.
I tried this 5 times already, and now I am having a leaving the game punishment aswell. So i have to wait long before even trying it. Any other suggestions ?

I'd suggest grabbing a set of system logs using our Hextech Repair Tool (to be clear, this isn't going to fix anything) so one of our techs can take a look at what's going on. You can attach these logs to a [technical support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll have a tech get back to you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
